name: Evolution (itch) (Pareal Games)
description:
You know that game Totally Accurate Battle Simulator? Yeah this is that but worse, way worse, where you can get Guys to fight each other with Hands, Bows and Arrows and Shields, That's it really, more will be coming soon

Controls:

Select a Unit: Press Numbers 1-3 and Press Enter (This is for Both Teams)
